consistencyChecks.details: Task A2-13 (Study Phase) is in escritor/current-task.md and ACTIVE.md, but MISSING from data.json tasks object. Agent status shows escritor on A2-13, but task doesn't exist in system.

Stats report 2 pending, 8 active, 1 review, 3 done (14 total), but workflow arrays contain only 13 task IDs. Tasks object has 59+ entries with mixed statuses. Count mismatch in stats.totalTasks (70) vs actual counted tasks (59 visible).
All agent statuses match between data.json and ACTIVE.md. CHAD_YI active on A6-3, Helios running audit, Escritor on A2-13, Quanta/MensaMusa blocked.
Quanta and MensaMusa blocked for 102+ hours waiting for credentials. No change since last audit.
A1-1 (Taiwan flights) due 2026-02-13 (~17 hours remaining). B6-1 and B6-3 due 2026-02-17 (~97 hours).

issuesFound.description: Task A2-13 exists in escritor's current-task.md and agent status, but is missing from data.json tasks object

issuesFound.action: CHAD_YI needs to add A2-13 to data.json tasks object

issuesFound.description: ACTIVE.md timestamp (22:36) is older than data.json (22:51). ACTIVE.md may be slightly stale.
issuesFound.impact: Minor - ACTIVE.md is reference only, data.json is source of truth

issuesFound.description: Quanta (A5-1) and MensaMusa (A5-2) remain blocked for 102+ hours awaiting credentials

issuesFound.action: Requires user decision - provide credentials or deprioritize tasks
